title: EventBridge Scheduler to call Lambda every 5 minutes with CDK
description: Simple pattern that triggers a .NET Lambda function every 5 minutes using Amazon EventBridge Scheduler and CDK

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The CDK stack creates a Lambda function, a scheduled event trigger using the AWS Scheduler service, and an IAM role with the required permissions for the Lambda function to be invoked.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
